Reviews.Content: Loved the Phoenix Stayed in the Phoenix for a second time recently and cannot fault the hotel.I found the rooms to be spacious, clean and comfortable and the staff welcoming.I would certainly recommend this hotel and will use it myself again in the future.Oh and by the way - it's the Merlion and not Merloin Musrag!!
Reviews.Author: Monkey68

Reviews.Content: Great location  Dont know how we come to stay there the first time , but on 3 or 4 following holidays, its an automatic selection.Rear entrance on orchard rd, also 1 min from MRT station. (MRT is transport system , cheap easy FAST, just great)Breakfast choice and quality really goodWould highly recommend the hotel.
Reviews.Author: traffs

Reviews.Content: It might be a FINE city but it was a terrible hotel!       Planet Hollywood in KL
